data.text:
@Irish112Guy @njdotcom Uninterested in having some argument about science.

I am interested in arguing about your opinions on policy alignment, or lack thereof, which has nothing to do with science in this case.
@RAWisROLLIE @njdotcom You're interested enough to keep coming back haha...

@RAWisROLLIE @njdotcom You're here pointing out your opinion on what I was saying. There's no science being brought up. I didn't say liberal science or conservative science, just science. Yet you go on these long-winded tweets about everything except the science NJ follows.

@Irish112Guy @njdotcom I'm here to point out that your complaints about alignment are silly, wrong, or both... not to convince you that masks are awesome or terrible. 

Keep fantasizing about some liberal science being brought up for you to totally own with a pile of links, because I'm uninterested.

@Irish112Guy @njdotcom Is "intimate knowledge of what kids go through" a fancy way of saying you were once a child, but don't want to tell me I'm right about you not being a parent?

PS-I've not once relied on science, defended any science, or even mentioned science at any point in this conversation.

@RAWisROLLIE @njdotcom Or, I'm someone who has intimate knowledge of what kids go through and am someone who has been knee-deep in this pandemic for 2 years. People are allowed to question illogical decisions made by the gov't. You still won't show me the science you love. I don't get it
@Irish112Guy @njdotcom People like you don't shock me. You're not a teacher or a parent, have no contact with kids, and have no idea how they think or act.
@RAWisROLLIE @njdotcom Wow....people like you really shock me. Do you think taking masks off children can be shocking to their system? That's the take of the day right there.

@Irish112Guy @njdotcom It's fascinating to me that you believe kids being told to put on masks is a traumatic, damaging experience, yet can't possibly fathom that taking them off might also be a shock to the system.

@Irish112Guy @njdotcom You can't imagine it because you don't care what goes into planning or parenting or educating.

https://t.co/UX18dIqufx
